item.title: According to Accenture, gaining digital skills could help reduce the gender gap by up to 40 years faster
item.description:
Source: Accenture. Closing the gender gap at work. According to Accenture research, digital skills and technologies are empowering women in Singapore to secure and progress in their careers. However, a wage disparity persists, with men earning more. Ranked 5th out of 31 countries in Accenture’s research, Singaporean women demonstrate significant progress in digital fluency, reflecting their adoption and utilization of digital tools for knowledge acquisition, networking, and enhanced efficiency...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/according-to-accenture-gaining-digital-skills-could-help-reduce-the-gender-gap-by-up-to-40-years-faster/

item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjusting the Gap at the Carriage Servo Pulley Bearing
item.description:
During the restoration of a Beogram 4000 turntable, significant longitudinal play was discovered in the threaded rod responsible for moving the carriage. This play resulted in a ‘clacking’ noise whenever the carriage changed direction. The issue was resolved by removing the servo pulley, damaged locking ring, and worn plastic washer. A new, thick 2-56 nylon washer, which fit snugly on the shaft, replaced the locking ring and washer. The locking ring became unnecessary as the pulley was secured with a setscrew...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-adjusting-the-gap-at-the-carriage-servo-pulley-bearing/
